&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000)
select top 0 tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(a.ma_vt) as ma_vt, rtrim(a.dvt) as dvt, a.ngay_ct, a.gia_nt, a.gia &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; into #d from #tagRow tr cross join d91$000000 a cross join dmvt b
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(a.ma_vt), rtrim(a.dvt), a.ngay_ct, a.gia_nt, a.gia &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join d91$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
